full_text: Intricate hearts adorn this softer-than-velvet knit blanket that’s a warm addition to baby’s world. Created in Bernat Baby Velvet yarn, you’ll soon discover that the fascinating design is actually easier than it looks to achieve. Using a slipped-stitch mosaic knitting technique, each color is worked individually in pairs of rows, ensuring that you’re only ever working with one strand of yarn at a time. It’s an interesting project that you can customize to match any nursery or playroom, so give this blanket with love. Materials: Size U.S. 7 (4.5 mm) circular knitting needle 36” 91.5 cm long
name: Ravelry: Party Heart-Y Mosaic (Knit) pattern by Yarnspirations Design Studio
